T.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1

F.query: select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >76 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >=4 and  q.maxresponses = 1

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-14' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1 and c.imageid > 500

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-14' and q.required  = 't' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1
select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >75 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-14' and q.questioncode >4 and  q.maxresponses = 1

select q.surveyid,c.questionid,c.id from questions q join choices c on q.id = c.questionid where q.externalsystemid >76 and q.etl_time > '2016-12-18' and c.active = 't' and q.questioncode >3 and q.maxresponses = 1
